subject: Alpine Skiing
Bobsledding
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Despite a wobble near the top section of the 1.7-mile Oreiller-Killy course, Lindsey Vonn finished in 1 minute 51.42 seconds.
snippet: Despite a wobble near the top section of the 1.7-mile Oreiller-Killy course, Lindsey Vonn finished in 1 minute 51.42 seconds.
